snippet: Olympus, a distributor of endoscopes, will pay $646 million to resolve criminal and civil inquiries into claims of kickbacks and foreign bribery.
abstract: Endoscope distributor Olympus will pay $646 million to settle separate criminal and civil investigations into claims of kickbacks and foreign bribery.
lead_paragraph: Olympus, a distributor of endoscopes, will pay $646 million to resolve criminal and civil inquiries into claims of kickbacks and foreign bribery.

headline.print_headline: Olympus to Pay $646 Million to Settle Bribery Claims
headline.main: Olympus to Pay $646 Million to Settle Bribery Claims
